items.name: Anomalib
items.description: An anomaly detection library comprising state-of-the-art algorithms and features such as experiment management, hyper-parameter optimization, and edge inference.

items.name: Captum
items.description: An open source, extensible library for model interpretability built on PyTorch.

items.name: ColossalAI
items.description: Tools to kickstart distributed training and inference

items.name: composer
items.description: A open-source deep learning training library optimized for scalability and usability, integrating best practices for efficient, multi-node training

items.name: DeepSpeed
items.description: DeepSpeed is a deep learning optimization library that makes distributed training and inference easy, efficient, and effective.

items.name: Depyf
items.description: depyf is a tool to help you understand debug and get insights into pytorch.compile

items.name: einops
items.description: Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code (for pytorch, jax, TF and others)

items.name: Horovod
items.description: Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet

items.name: Ignite
items.description: High-level library to help with training and evaluating neural networks in PyTorch

items.name: MMF
items.description: A modular framework for vision & language multimodal research.

items.name: ONNX runtime
items.description: High performance ML inferencing and training accelerator

items.name: Opacus
items.description: Train PyTorch models with Differential Privacy

items.name: OpenCompass
items.description: OpenCompass is an LLM evaluation platform, supporting a wide range of models (Llama3, Mistral, InternLM2,GPT-4,LLaMa2, Qwen,GLM, Claude, etc) over 100+ datasets.

items.name: skorch
items.description: A scikit-learn compatible neural network library that wraps PyTorch.

items.name: TensorLy
items.description: TensorLy is a Python library that aims at making tensor learning simple and accessible. It allows to easily perform tensor decomposition, tensor learning and tensor algebra. Its backend system allows to seamlessly perform computation with NumPy, PyTorch, JAX, TensorFlow, CuPy or Paddle, and run methods at scale on CPU or GPU.

items.name: torchdistill
items.description: Offers various state-of-the-art knowledge distillation methods and enables you to design (new) experiments simply by editing a declarative yaml config file.

items.name: TorchMetrics
items.description: Machine learning metrics for distributed, scalable PyTorch applications.

items.name: USB
items.description: Benchmark tool for developing and evaluating Semi-suprevised learning algorithms.  Includes an implementation of 14 SSL algorithms and 15 tasks for evaluation for CV, NLP, and Audio

items.name: accelerate
items.description: Accelerate is a library that enables the same PyTorch code to be run across distributed configurations

items.name: Ensemble-Pytorch
items.description: unified ensemble framework for PyTorch to improve the performance and robustness of your ensemble based deep learning model

items.name: intel-extension-for-pytorch
items.description: A Python extension to optimize performance on an Intel platform.

items.name: neural-compressor
items.description: An open-source Python library supporting popular model compression techniques on all deep learning frameworks.

items.name: Optuna
items.description: Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework, particularly designed for machine learning.

items.name: PopTorch
items.description: PopTorch is a set of extensions for PyTorch enabling models to be trained, evaluated and used on the Graphcore IPU.

items.name: PyTorch Lightning
items.description: Pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models on multiple GPUs, TPUs with zero code changes.

items.name: Ray
items.description: Ray is a unified framework for scaling AI and Python applications. Ray consists of a core distributed runtime and a set of AI Libraries for accelerating ML workloads.

items.name: Torch-TensorRT
items.description: Torch-TensorRT is a inference compiler for PyTorch, targeting NVIDIA GPUs via NVIDIAâ€™s TensorRT Deep Learning Optimizer and Runtime.

items.name: Torchopt
items.description: An efficient library for differentiable optimization built upon PyTorch

items.name: Zeus
items.description: Zeus is a library for measuring the energy consumption of Deep Learning workloads and optimizing their energy consumption.

items.name: Clear ML
items.description: Suite of tools to streamline your AI workflow.

items.name: Determined
items.description: Determined is an open-source machine learning platform that simplifies distributed training, hyperparameter tuning, experiment tracking, and resource management. Works with PyTorch and TensorFlow.

items.name: DGL
items.description: Python package built to ease deep learning on graph, on top of existing DL frameworks.  Fast and memory-efficient message passing primitives for training Graph Neural Networks.

items.name: fastai
items.description: fastai is a deep learning library which provides practitioners with high-level components that can quickly and easily provide state-of-the-art results in standard deep learning domains, and provides researchers with low-level components that can be mixed and matched to build new approaches

items.name: ivy
items.description: Convert Machine Learning Code Between Frameworks

items.name: OctoML Profiler
items.description: octoml-profile is a python library and cloud service that enables ML engineers to easily assess the performance and cost of PyTorch models on cloud hardware with state-of-the-art ML acceleration technology.

items.name: PySyft
items.description: Perform data science on data that remains in someone else's server

items.name: Flower
items.description: A unified approach to federated learning, analytics, and evaluation. Federate any workload, any ML framework, and any programming language

items.name: Substra
items.description: Substra is used to run complex federated learning experiments at scale.

items.name: Albumentations
items.description: a Python library for image augmentation used in deep learning and computer vision tasks to increase the quality of trained models. The purpose of image augmentation is to create new training samples from the existing data.

items.name: Clinica DL
items.description: open-source deep learning software for reproducible neuroimaging processing. It can be seen as the deep learning extension of Clinica, an open-source Python library for neuroimaging preprocessing and analysis.

items.name: GaNDLF
items.description: The Generally Nuanced Deep Learning Framework (GaNDLF) for image segmentation and classification, especially in the biomedical field.

items.name: Kornia
items.description: Kornia is a geometric computer vision Library for spatial AI library that allows classical computer vision to be integrated into deep learning models.

items.name: Lightly
items.description: LightlySSL is a computer vision framework for self-supervised learning.

items.name: OpenMMLab
items.description: Open-source computer vision algorithms and models.

items.name: PyTorch3D
items.description: PyTorch3D is a library of reusable components for deep learning with 3D data

items.name: joeynmt
items.description: JoeyNMT is a minimalist neural machine translation toolkit for educational purposes.

items.name: PyPose
items.description: PyPose is a library for Robot Learning with Physics-based Optimization

items.name: PyPOTS
items.description: a Python toolbox for machine learning on Partially-Observed Time Series

items.name: PyTorch Geometric
items.description: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch

items.name: PyTorch Metric Learning
items.description: Modular, flexible, and extensible library for deep metric learning.

items.name: SimulAI
items.description: A toolkit with data-driven pipelines for physics-informed machine learning.

items.name: baal
items.description: Baal is a Bayesian active learning library. Provides methods to do posterior distribution sampling in order to maximize the efficiency of labelling during active learning. Our library is suitable for research and industrial applications.

items.name: BoTorch
items.description: A Framework for Efficient Monte-Carlo Bayesian Optimization

items.name: GPyTorch
items.description: GPyTorch is a Gaussian process library implemented using PyTorch. GPyTorch is designed for creating scalable, flexible, and modular Gaussian process models with ease

items.name: Pomegranate
items.description: pomegranate is a Python package that implements fast and flexible probabilistic models ranging from individual probability distributions to compositional models such as Bayesian networks and hidden Markov models

items.name: Pyro
items.description: Deep universal probabilistic programming with Python and PyTorch

items.name: FuseMedML
items.description: A python framework accelerating ML based discovery in the medical field by encouraging code reuse

items.name: MONAI
items.description: AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging

items.name: TIAToolbox
items.description: TIAToolbox is a computational pathology toolbox for pathology image analysis.

items.name: TorchIO
items.description: Medical imaging toolkit for deep learning

items.name: ludwig
items.description: Ludwig is a low-code framework for building custom AI models like LLMs and other deep neural networks.

items.name: NeMo
items.description: A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

items.name: PyKale
items.description: PyKale has a unified pipeline-based API and focuses on multimodal learning and transfer learning for graphs, images, and videos at the moment, with supporting models on deep learning and dimensionality reduction.

items.name: Diffusers
items.description: Pretrained diffusion models for generating images, audio, and even 3D structures of molecules. Whether you are looking for a simple inference solution or want to train your own diffusion model, Diffusers is a modular toolbox that supports both

items.name: Stable Baselines3
items.description: Stable Baselines3 (SB3) is a set of implementations of reinforcement learning algorithms

items.name: Transformers
items.description: Transformers provides thousands of pretrained models to perform tasks on different modalities such as text, vision, and audio.

items.name: AllenNLP
items.description: An NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.

items.name: Flair
items.description: Flair allows you to apply our state-of-the-art natural language processing (NLP) models to your text, such as named entity recognition (NER), sentiment analysis, part-of-speech tagging (PoS), special support for biomedical texts, sense disambiguation and classification, with support for a rapidly growing number of languages

items.name: avalanche
items.description: Avalanche is an End-to-End Continual Learning Library based on PyTorch, for fast prototyping, training, and reproducible evaluation of continual learning algorithms.

items.name: Renate
items.description: Renate is a Python package for automatic retraining of neural networks models. It uses advanced Continual Learning and Lifelong Learning algorithms to achieve this purpose.

items.name: PennyLane
items.description: PennyLane is a cross-platform Python library for quantum computing, quantum machine learning, and quantum chemistry. Train a quantum computer the same way as a neural network.

items.name: TorchQuantum
items.description: A framework for Quantum Classical Simulation, Quantum Machine Learning, Quantum Neural Networks, Parameterized Quantum Circuits with support for easy deployments on real quantum computers.

items.name: raster-vision
items.description: Raster Vision is an open source library and framework for Python developers building computer vision models on satellite, aerial, and other large imagery sets (including oblique drone imagery). There is built-in support for chip classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation using PyTorch.

items.name: torchgeo
items.description: TorchGeo is a toolkit containing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for geospatial data.
